summary: September 24 is the 267th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: The Comprehensive Nuclear-Test-Ban Treaty  is a multilateral treaty by which states agree to ban all nuclear explosions in all environments, for military or civilian purposes. It was adopted by the United Nations General Assembly on 10 September 1996 but it has not entered into force due to the non-ratification of eight specific states.
title: Comprehensive Test Ban Treaty
